data.text: Nsa yɛ ɔfɛdifoɔ na nsaden yɛ ntɔkwapɛfoɔ;
Ɔhene abufuhyeɛ te sɛ gyata mmobom;
Ɛyɛ onipa animuonyam sɛ ɔbɛkwati akasakasa,
Onihafoɔ mfuntum nʼasase wɔ ne berɛ mu;
Onipa akoma apɛdeɛ yɛ subunu mu,
Nnipa dodoɔ no ara ka sɛ wɔwɔ ɔdɔ a ɛnsa da,
Ɔteneneeni bu ɔbra kronkron;
Sɛ ɔhene tena nʼahennwa so bu atɛn a,
Hwan na ɔbɛtumi aka sɛ, “Mapra mʼakoma mu;
Nkariboɔ ne susudua a ɛnyɛ papa no
Mpo wɔnam abɔfra nneyɛɛ so hunu no,
Aso a wɔde te asɛm ne ani a wɔde hunu adeɛ,
Mma nna nyɛ wo dɛ, na woanni hia;
Ɔtɔfoɔ ka sɛ, “Ɛnyɛ, ɛnyɛ!”
Sika kɔkɔɔ wɔ hɔ, na nhwenepa nso abu so,
Fa obi a ɔdi ɔhɔhoɔ akagyinamu atadeɛ;
Aduane a wɔnya no ɛkwan bɔne so no yɛ onipa anomu dɛ,
Pɛ afotuo yɛ wo nhyehyɛeɛ;
Osekuni da kokoamsɛm adi;
Sɛ obi dome nʼagya anaasɛ ne maame a,
Agyapadeɛ a wɔpere ho nya no ahyɛaseɛ no
Nka sɛ, “Mɛtua wo saa bɔne yi so ka!”
Awurade kyiri nkariboɔ a ɛnyɛ papa,
Awurade na ɔkyerɛ onipa anammɔntuo.
Obi pɛ ntɛm hyɛ bɔ, ansa na wadwene ho a,
Ɔhene nyansafoɔ hunu amumuyɛfoɔ;
Awurade kanea hwehwɛ onipa honhom mu,
Ɔdɔ ne nokorɛdie bɔ ɔhene ho ban;
Mmeranteɛ animuonyam ne wɔn ahoɔden,
Ɔhweɛ ne apirakuro hohoro amumuyɛ
